experience.title: Graduate Research Assistant
experience.description: Led a research initiative focused on optimizing distributed system latency. Developed a custom benchmarking suite in C++ to analyze throughput under varied network conditions. Authored a paper on high-concurrency data structures.

experience.title: Software Engineering Research Intern
experience.description: Implemented experimental features in an open-source JVM-based language to study garbage collection efficiency. Utilized Java for profile-guided optimization research, resulting in a 12% improvement in memory allocation speeds for specific workloads.

experience.title: Independent Researcher
experience.description: Conducted a comparative analysis of lock-free versus lock-based algorithms in multi-threaded Java applications. Published findings and code samples to a repository used by the academic community for software verification studies.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
